description: The AWS::CloudWatch::CompositeAlarm type specifies an alarm which aggregates the states of other Alarms (Metric or Composite Alarms) as defined by the AlarmRule expression

AlarmName.description: The name of the Composite Alarm
AlarmName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Composite Alarm

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: Replacement

AlarmRule.description: Expression which aggregates the state of other Alarms (Metric or Composite Alarms)
AlarmRule.markdownDescription:
Expression which aggregates the state of other Alarms (Metric or Composite Alarms)

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 10240  
Update requires: No interruption

AlarmDescription.markdownDescription:
The description of the alarm

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

ActionsEnabled.description: Indicates whether actions should be executed during any changes to the alarm state. The default is TRUE.
ActionsEnabled.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether actions should be executed during any changes to the alarm state. The default is TRUE.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action
items.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

OKActions.description: The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the OK state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
OKActions.markdownDescription:
The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the OK state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action
items.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

AlarmActions.description: The list of actions to execute when this alarm transitions into an ALARM state from any other state. Specify each action as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
AlarmActions.markdownDescription:
The list of actions to execute when this alarm transitions into an ALARM state from any other state. Specify each action as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action
items.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

InsufficientDataActions.description: The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the INSUFFICIENT_DATA state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
InsufficientDataActions.markdownDescription:
The actions to execute when this alarm transitions to the INSUFFICIENT_DATA state from any other state. Each action is specified as an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ActionsSuppressor.description: Actions will be suppressed if the suppressor alarm is in the ALARM state. ActionsSuppressor can be an AlarmName or an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) from an existing alarm.
ActionsSuppressor.markdownDescription:
Actions will be suppressed if the suppressor alarm is in the ALARM state. ActionsSuppressor can be an AlarmName or an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) from an existing alarm. 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1600  
Update requires: No interruption

ActionsSuppressorWaitPeriod.description: Actions will be suppressed if ExtensionPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.
ActionsSuppressorWaitPeriod.markdownDescription:
Actions will be suppressed if ExtensionPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ActionsSuppressorExtensionPeriod.description: Actions will be suppressed if WaitPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.
ActionsSuppressorExtensionPeriod.markdownDescription:
Actions will be suppressed if WaitPeriod is active. The length of time that actions are suppressed is in seconds.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A list of key-value pairs to associate with the composite alarm. You can associate as many as 50 tags with an alarm.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of key-value pairs to associate with the composite alarm. You can associate as many as 50 tags with an alarm.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AlarmActionARN.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the action

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: Metadata that you can assign to a composite alarm, Tags can help you organize and categorize your resources.

Key.description: A unique identifier for the tag. The combination of tag keys and values can help you organize and categorize your resources.
Key.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the tag. The combination of tag keys and values can help you organize and categorize your resources.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the specified tag key.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the specified tag key.

Required: Yes
